beer_brewer_name: Port Brewing Co / The Lost Abbey
review_blob: Bottle. Amber with white head. Aroma is super piney, resinous, mango, solvent, glue, alcohol. Taste of caramel, mango, pine, glue, alcohol. Sweet , bitter and hot. This is an old bottle, might be better fresch
Bottle. Golden with white head. Aroma of pine, mango and grapefruit. Taste is similar, very piney and resinous with orange. Medium body and a long finish
beer_name: The Kernel Pale Ale Simcoe Amarillo Mosaic

review_blob: Bottle. Looks like dirty pond water with white head. Fruity aroma, grapefruit and orange. Similar taste, sharp grapefruit.
beer_name: The Kernel Pale Ale Amarillo Nelson Sauvin

review_blob: Bottle. Hazy golden with white head. Massive sharp bret aroma as expected, funky, sharp, lemon, pineapple. Taste of pineapple, lemon, pepper. Dry and tart. Nice

Bottle. Golden with a slight pinkish hue, peach colour with no head. Aroma of sharp apple and a hint of cherry. Taste is much deeper, apple, cherry, spice and honey. Sweet and clean. Goes down like fruit juice.
Bottle. Black with tan head. Nice big bold aroma, smells of vanilla, marshmallow. Taste is super bold, vanilla, sweets, roasty, chocolate. Sweet. Delishis. Biggy smores, I get it.
beer_name: Three Notchd Biggie Smores Imperial Stout

review_blob: Bottle. Dark brown with tan head. Aroma is vegetal, dirty underwear, earthy. Taste is vegetal, caramel, oak. Sweet and bitter. Disgusting.
Bottle. Dark brown with tan head. Aroma of brownies, chocolate, tootsie roll. Tastevis similar, fudgy, chocolate, brownie. Sweet and a little hot. Nice
Bottle. Amber with a white head. Aroma is sharp, apple, cherry, oak. Taste is similar, fruity, sharp.dry and bitter.
Bottle. Brown with tan head. Aroma of peppery spice, yeast, caramel. Taste is similar, caramel and peppery yeast.
beer_name: Uinta Crooked Line Port O Call

review_blob: Bottle. Golden with white head. Aroma of earth and a bit of peppery spice. Taste is cakey, carrot cake, peppery spice.
beer_name: Juli Goldenberg / Monkey Paw / Stone 24 Carrot Golden Ale

review_blob: Bottle. Black with tan head. Aroma of molasses, oak, whisky. Taste of smooth whisky, smoke, roast. Bit flat.
Bottle. Golden with white head. Aroma of grapefruit, grape, pepper, earthy. Taste of grape, gooseberry, peppery yeast, earth. Dry and a little bitter.
beer_name: Stewart Craft Beer Kitchen Grapes of Wrath

review_blob: Can. Amber with white head. Strong pine and caramel aroma. Taste isnsimar, super resinous, piney, touch of grapefruits. Decent body with an bitter finish
Bottle. Amber with white head. Aroma of dried fruit, apple, caramel. Taste of figs, caramel, yeast. Medium body and a clean finish.
Bottle. Black with no head. Aroma reminds me of a jobby I once did circa July 2013. Taste is a little smokey, roasty, coffee. Dry and thin.
Bottle. Golden with white head. Yeasty aroma, earthy, peppery and some lemon. Taste is simar, peppery earthy yeast. Dry.
Bottle. Golden with a purple tinge. Big sharp fruity aroma, berries. Taste is sharp, sherbet, berries, summer fruits. Dry and a little tart.
beer_name: Mad Hatter Blueberry Pancake & Maple Syrup

review_blob: Bottle thanks to top dog. Cloudy brown with tan head. Smells oxidised in a bad way, sherry, bread, chlorine, swimming pool, cardboard. Taste of sherry, dried fruit, cardboard, anus, horse cock. Little sweet.
beer_name: Harveys Bicentenary Stout - The Battle of Trafalgar

review_blob: Bottle. Amber with white head. Aroma of earth, yeast and caramel. Taste is yeasty, Belgian, spice, earth. Quite bitter.
beer_name: Mad Hatter Drink Me Membrillo Tripel

review_blob: Bottle with massive thanks to Fat Man Scope. Black with tan head. Absolutely stinks of the coconuts, some rich dark chocolates. Taste is similar, lot of the coconuts, dark chocolate, dark fruit. Sweet and warming. The real deal.
beer_name: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Proprietors 2014

review_blob: Bottle. Cloudy orange with white head. Massive raspberry aroma, smells increds. Taste is similar, lots of raspberry. Quite sweet. Nice
Bottle. Black with tan head. Aroma is roasty, chocate, caramel. Taste isbroasty, ashy, burnt. Very dry.
Bottle. Golden with white head. Stinks of buteric, straight up spew, some corn, disgusting. Taste of spew and cereal. An offensive beverage.
Bottle. Cloudy orange with off white head. Aroma of spiced pumpkin, clove, smells like hippies. Taste is OTT clove, spice, hippies, josh sticks, Buddhist temples. Little sweet. A tough drink
Hazy golden with white head. Aroma is grassy, pine, grapefruit, orange, caramel. Taste of pine and grapefruit. Very bitter
Bottle. Golden with white head. Aroma of pine, earth and biscuit, some weird perfume. Taste of pine, caramel, earth. Sweet and extremely bitter.
Bottle. Black with tan head. Aroma of licorice, coconut, chocolate, oak. Taste is very rich, licorice, chocolate, coconut, oak, strong bourbon. Sweet and a little hot. Tidy.
Bottle. Gold with a pinkish hue and white head. Smells of strawberry, earth, bit of spew. Taste of strawberry, caramel and earth. Dry and thin
Bottle. Clear golden with white head. Aroma of cereal, earth, lemon. Taste is earthy, lemon, banana. Dry and a bit thin. Had worse
Bottle. Amber with white head. Aroma of cereal and caramel. Taste is similar, caramel and cereal, bread,corn. Little sweet and little bitter.
Bottle. Golden with white head. Sharp sherbet aroma, funk and fruit. Taste is fruity, lemon with some funk. Dry and a little tart
Bottle. Brown with tan head. Aroma of nuts, biscuit, chocolate. Taste is similar, nuts and chocolate. Medium body with a clean finish
Keg at Bat. Golden with white head. strong sharp fruity aroma, little funky, hoppy, pine. taste is simar, sharp tropical fruit. Dry and lightly sour. Tasty
Keg at bat. Black with tan head. Aroma is straight up delicious coffee, strong, roasty, rich. Taste is similar, strong black rich coffee. Smooth and creamy. Delish.

Keg at Bat. Reddish brown with white head. aroma of funk, oak, berries, peppery spice, balsamic. Taste is similar, berries, oak, spice, balsamic very Flanders Red. A little sweetness in there and lightly sour. Bit of a yeasty finish but good all round

Can. Golden with white head. Aroma of lager yeast, biscuit, caramel and cereal. Taste is similar, cereal, bread, caramel. Little sweet and a crisp finish with a long unpleasant aftertaste. The aftertaste is like the smell of stale beer when spilled on a carpet. A truly bad beer.

Bottle. Darkest brown, reddish when held to the light with tan head. lots of dried fruit in the aroma, sherry, prune, some chocolate and coffee in there as well, little vanilla. Taste is very rich, coffee, chocolate, tootsie roll, dried fruit, prune. Quite dry and a little bitter. Tasty gear.
Bottle. Golden with white head. Aroma is quite floral and citrusy, parma violets and grapefruit. Taste is similar but with some eggy funk in the finish. Dry and lightly tart. Ok

Fancy Can. Dark amber with off white head. Piney aroma, caramel, toffee, some grapefruits. Taste is well balanced, caramel, pine and grapefruits with a pleasant spicy rye flavour finish. Full bodied with a clean slightly bitter finish. A solid enjoyable beverage.

Bottle. Cloudy orange/brown with decent white head. Aroma of orange sherbet, sharp and quite subdued. Taste of orange and pine, sherbety with a long piney finish. Quite bitter from start to finish with a long bitter finish. Fairly standard Kernel, not sure whats separating this one from the rest, it does seem more bitter than others, whether actual or perceived.

Bottle. Black with tan head. Intense roasty aroma, coffee, ash, burnt notes, chocolate. Taste is full on roasty as well, coffee, char. Smooth and easy to drink, tad thin for weight class perhaps. Nice
UPDATED: JAN 21, 2016

Bottle. Amber with white head. aroma of grapefruit and pine. Taste is citrusy but with a strong malt presence, biscuit and caramel amd some yeasty tones. Tangy and bitter. Could do with toning down the malt imo
Keg at Safari Lounge. Massive hoppy aroma, orange, grapefruit and pine. Similar taste, pure hop juice, orange and grapefruit. Dry, on the thin side, refreshing and tasty.
Bottle. Deep beetroot red purple. Strong aroma of cherry, funk, earth. Taste of rich cherry, like cherry drops. Sweet and tart.
Bottle. Black with tan head. Aroma of licorice, molasses, spice. Taste of molasses and spicy yeast phenols. smooth with a tiny alcohol hit. Nice

Bottle thanks to Tadus Maximus. Black with tan head. Strong licorice aroma, molasses, some chocolate and boozy liquer. Taste is strong, licorice, molasses, chocolate, some alcohol. Sweet with a bit of a burn.
beer_name: The Bruery Black Tuesday Imperial Stout

review_blob: Bottle. Black with tan head. Aroma of gingerbread, spices, chocolate, oak. Taste is rich, lots of coconut, gingerbread and chocolate, the flavours work so well together. Medium body with a clean finish.
Bottle. Black with tan head. Absolutely stinks of ginger, spices. Taste of ginger and spices, like a gingerbread man. Medium body with a clean finish. Not a big fan of ginger
